::Description::


PayDay 2 co-op shooter game for four players, allowing everyone to get used 
again to the role of the heroes of the original PayDay Dallas, Hoxton, Cheynsa 
and Wulff. The new network Crimenet offers a wide variety of cases from the relatively simple attacks on shops and abduction, robbery storage bankov.Po to progress through the missions, a team of four players sent to the more complex 
and profitable mission.
